thread.title: Woman Hangs Upside Down from a Helicopter Above Racetrack

title: Woman Hangs Upside Down from a Helicopter Above Racetrack
text:
> Entertainment Woman Hangs Upside Down from a Helicopter Above Racetrack Stuntwoman Erendira Wallenda dangled over the Charlotte Motor Speedway from an aerial ring attached to a helicopter before the Bank of America 500 on Oct. 11. She did not use a harness and at times, s
